name: AHX Music Tracker Module
summary: Learn about .AHX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The AHX format replaced the .THX format when the developers of the THX music tracker were forced to change the application's name for legal reasons.
NOTE: A Windows version of AHX, named WinAHX, also allows users to save audio as AHX files.

description: An AHX file is an audio file created by Abyss' Highest eXperience (AHX), a music tracker for Amiga computers. It contains data used to play synthesized music. The AHX format supports C64 waveforms, including the triangle, sawtooth, square, and white noise.

instructions: You can open an AHX file with Cloanto Amiga Forever (multiplatform), Audio Overload (multiplatform), WinAHX (Windows), CocoModX (Mac), or UADE (Linux).
